name: Hey You! Pikachu Demake
description:
A demake of one of my favorite N64 games for the gameboy. I made this for #gbcompo21.

Interact, scroll text = Alt = A

Shoot bubble = Ctrl = B

Thunderbolt = Select/Shift + B/Ctrl

Move with WASD or arrows

I'm still working on the stuff in the front yard. Thank you for being patient :)
